/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function FilterTableItems() { const [inp,setInp]=useState('') useEffect(() =>{ filter() return()=>{ console.log("Component Unmounted"); } },[inp]) const filter = () =>{ const table=document.getElementById("table") const rows=table.querySelectorAll("tbody tr") for(let i=0;i=0) rows[i].style.display="" else rows[i].style.display="none" } } return (
FilterTableItems
setInp(e.target.value)} />

) } export default FilterTableItems
